Text: Effective as of February 7, 2022
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
Data We Collect
We use cookies, pixel tags, local storage objects, server logs and other tracking technologies to collect and store data about you and your activities. These tracking technologies carry unique identifiers, which are relative to either your browser or account, and allow us to make informed decisions to better your experience with our services, such as personalizing content and advertisements to match your taste profile, remembering your preferences, improving the features you use, and building new features and services.

We use both first- and third-party cookies. First-party cookies are set by the website that is being visited. Third-party cookies are set by a domain other than that of the website you are visiting. When accessing the Service on the Site, we set first-party cookies and our trusted third-party business partners set third-party cookies. When accessing the Service via a website we do not own, we and our trusted third-party business partners set third-party cookies.

We use a combination of persistent and session cookies. Persistent cookies are cookies that remain on a user’s device for the period of time specified in the cookie; the length varies based on the use, but we typically expire persistent cookies within 18 months or less, although there are times we may need to keep them around for longer than 18 months. Session cookies are temporary, starting when your browser window opens and deleting when it closes.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We also use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. Google Analytics uses cookies or other tracking technologies to help us analyze how users interact with the Site and Service, compile reports on their activity, and provide other services related to their activity and usage. The technologies used by Google may collect information such as your IP address, time of visit, whether you are a returning visitor, and any referring website. The technologies used by Google Analytics do not gather information that personally identifies you. The information generated by Google Analytics will be transmitted to and stored by Google and will be subject to Google’s privacy policies. To learn more about Google’s partner services and to learn how to opt-out of tracking of analytics by Google, click here.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Classifications of Cookies We Use.
Broadly, we use four classifications of cookies. Some of the cookies we use span multiple classifications.

Strictly Necessary Cookies
Allow you to interact with the Service and access secure areas, such as updating your billing information. Without these cookies, we cannot provide the requested services in a useful and safe manner.

Performance Cookies
Allow us to analyze how users interact with the Service, so that we can improve the user experience and build new features that are useful.

Functionality Cookies
Used to remember choices you have made, such as layout, language or product preferences.

Targeting Cookies
Used to recommend content and advertisements that match your personal taste profile.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Basic Data We Automatically Collect.\nWhen you access the Site and Service, we collect and store basic device data, such as IP address, approximate geographic location, device type, browser, and operating system.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Activity.\nWhenever you access the Service, we and our trusted third-party business partners, consisting of advertisers, publishers and third-party vendors (“Partners”), use a combination of the technologies listed above to better understand how you interact with our Service. This includes interactions with the Service directly, as well as tracking your activity when we directly refer you to a third-party website, such as tracking product purchases. This data is foundational in personalizing content and advertisements to match your taste profile, remembering your preferences, improving the features you use, and building new features and services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Activity.\nWhenever you access the Service, we and our trusted third-party business partners, consisting of advertisers, publishers and third-party vendors (“Partners”), use a combination of the technologies listed above to better understand how you interact with our Service. This includes interactions with the Service directly, as well as tracking your activity when we directly refer you to a third-party website, such as tracking product purchases. This data is foundational in personalizing content and advertisements to match your taste profile, remembering your preferences, improving the features you use, and building new features and services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Account and Profile Data.\nWhen you register an account with the Company, we ask for personally identifiable data, such as name, email address, and date of birth.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: If you are a publisher or advertiser, there is often additional data we need to collect in order to execute the business relationship, such as payment data; we collect, store and use this data directly through the Service, through and in conjunction with third-party vendors, and through various business forms, such as insertion orders.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: If you are a publisher or advertiser, there is often additional data we need to collect in order to execute the business relationship, such as payment data; we collect, store and use this data directly through the Service, through and in conjunction with third-party vendors, and through various business forms, such as insertion orders.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: How We Use the Data We Collect\nWe use data collected directly from you, from our trusted Partners, and via publicly available data sources to improve your experience with our services. Our business and commercial purposes include, but are not limited to, counting ad impressions to unique visitors, verifying positioning and quality of ad impressions, and auditing compliance with this specification and other standards. For example, we use your activity data to better understand your personal preferences, ensuring we deliver you content, advertisements, and experiences that match your personal taste profile. More broadly, we analyze aggregated trends to better understand how our product decisions detract or add to your experience when accessing the Service.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

For example, we use your activity data to better understand your personal preferences, ensuring we deliver you content, advertisements, and experiences that match your personal taste profile. More broadly, we analyze aggregated trends to better understand how our product decisions detract or add to your experience when accessing the Service.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Unregistered Users.\nIf you are accessing the Service as an unregistered user (e.g., you are not logged in), we still track the data described above in the “Basic Data We Automatically Collect” and “Activity” sections, but rather than tying that data to a logged-in account, we automatically associate it with a logged-out account ID, which allows us to personalize the content and advertising experience for you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
When We Share Your Data
Publicly Available Content.
As a registered user, the content you create, as well as some of the non-sensitive personal data you enter about yourself (e.g., your name), is made publicly available. If you do not want this content and data available to others, please do not create or enter it. If you have previously created content or entered personal data and no longer want it publicly available, please log in and delete it. If you are also concerned about other personal data associated with your account, such as your activity, please follow the instructions above to request an account deletion.

Partners.
Our Partners independently collect and store their own data on users. Please read the privacy policies published on those websites or in those apps that you interact with, as their data collection, use, and sharing may differ. This Privacy Policy only governs personally identifiable data that is acquired by us through the Service. The Company is not responsible for any improper use by such parties.

Service Partners.
We may share personally identifiable data with service providers who perform data or Service-related services on our behalf (e.g., email, hosting, maintenance, backup, analysis, etc.) and to prepare, deploy, and analyze advertising content.

Aggregated Trends.
We may analyze and disclose non-identifiable data, such as aggregated user trends, without restriction.

Legal.
We may disclose your data if we are required to do so by law. This includes disclosure in connection with any legal proceedings or prospective legal proceedings, or to establish, exercise, or defend our legal rights, including providing information to others for the purposes of fraud prevention.

Sale or Merger
We may disclose your data to any other person or entity as part of any business or asset sale, equity transaction, merger, acquisition or in preparation for any of these events.

Consent.
We may disclose your data to any other person or entity where you consent to the disclosure.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Service Partners.\nWe may share personally identifiable data with service providers who perform data or Service-related services on our behalf (e.g., email, hosting, maintenance, backup, analysis, etc.) and to prepare, deploy, and analyze advertising content.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Legal.
We may disclose your data if we are required to do so by law. This includes disclosure in connection with any legal proceedings or prospective legal proceedings, or to establish, exercise, or defend our legal rights, including providing information to others for the purposes of fraud prevention.

Sale or Merger
We may disclose your data to any other person or entity as part of any business or asset sale, equity transaction, merger, acquisition or in preparation for any of these events.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Sale or Merger\nWe may disclose your data to any other person or entity as part of any business or asset sale, equity transaction, merger, acquisition or in preparation for any of these events.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Subject to certain limitations, the CCPA provides California consumers the right to request more information about the categories or specific pieces of personal information we collect (including how we use and disclose this information), to delete their personal information, to opt out of any "sales" that may be occurring, and to not be discriminated against for exercising these rights.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: California consumers may make a request pursuant to their rights under the CCPA by contacting us at privacy@decide.co or by calling us toll-free at (800) 560-3603.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Our use of certain third-party cookies to provide the Service may constitute "sales" under the CCPA.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Activity.\nWhenever you access the Service, we and our trusted third-party business partners, consisting of advertisers, publishers and third-party vendors (“Partners”), use a combination of the technologies listed above to better understand how you interact with our Service. This includes interactions with the Service directly, as well as tracking your activity when we directly refer you to a third-party website, such as tracking product purchases. This data is foundational in personalizing content and advertisements to match your taste profile, remembering your preferences, improving the features you use, and building new features and services.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Basic Data We Automatically Collect.\nWhen you access the Site and Service, we collect and store basic device data, such as IP address, approximate geographic location, device type, browser, and operating system.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Changes\nOn a periodic basis, changes will be made to the Privacy Policy which will be noted by presenting the date of the latest modifications at the beginning of the Privacy Policy. To ensure you are fully informed on these updates, please review this Privacy Policy on a regular basis.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy
